wikipedia_page.main: Major Gerald Herbert Loxley (1885–1950) was a decorated British aviator of the First World War deployed in military intelligence, before serving with the United Nations in Switzerland.

link_mentions.page: Tom Bingham, Baron Bingham of Cornhill
response: In 1963 he married Elizabeth Loxley, a Somerville graduate whose great-uncle was Major Gerald Loxley, of the Loxley family of Northcott Court, Hertfordshire;www.historicengland.org.uk they had one daughter Catherine Elizabeth (born 1965), known as Kate, and two sons Thomas Henry (Harry, born 1967) and Christopher Toby (Kit, born 1969).www.burkespeerage.com Their only daughter, Kate Bingham, has been married since 1992 to Jesse Norman, MP, then Conservative government minister.Profile: Dr Jesse Norman MP, Jessenorman.com; accessed 28 March 2016.
